TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Import extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a single [Import](../Topic/Import%20Element%20\(MSBuild\).md) element in an [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](../../../../../../../add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project.
Gets the `Condition` attribute value of the [Import](../Topic/Import%20Element%20\(MSBuild\).md) element.
Docs.value: The `Condition` attribute value of the `Import` element.

Docs.summary: Gets the fully qualified path of the file specified in the `Name` attribute of the [Import](../Topic/Import%20Element%20\(MSBuild\).md) element.
Docs.value: The fullly qualified path of the file specified in the `Name` attribute of the `Import` element.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the [Import](../Topic/Import%20Element%20\(MSBuild\).md) element was imported into the project.
Docs.value: `true` if the `Import` element was imported into the project; otherwise, `false`.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the `Project` attribute value of the [Import](../Topic/Import%20Element%20\(MSBuild\).md) element.
Docs.value: The `Project` attribute value of the `Import` element.
